turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a grande caffe latte with regular milk and an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, by regular milk did you mean whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to let you know, they will charge extra for that espresso shot to be added, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, can you tell me which city you're in and i'll find some near you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you near the starbucks on 3rd street?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i will place your order there, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe latte with 2% milk and an extra shot of espresso to be picked up at the starbucks on 3rd street in columbus.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 7 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be great. Thank you.
